hero_token_description: A Refresh Token is a special kind of token that can be used to obtain a new renewed access token which allows access to the protected resources. You can request for the new access tokens by using the Refresh Token in Web API until the Refresh Token is valid.
page_not_found_description: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
confirmation_instructions: We have sent a confirmation email to you. Please check your checkbox for further instructions to activate your account
activation_success: Congratulations! Your account has been activated. You can now log in.
account_already_activated: Your account has already been activated. You can now log in.
activation_fail: Your account activation failed. Please try again.
password_reset_instruction: Enter the your email address and we will send you a link to change your password
password_success_instruction: We have sent you an email with a link to change your password. Check your inbox and click on the link to reset password.
password_reset_fail: Reset password failed. Check your url or request password reset link again.
password_reset_fail_description: Unfortunately password reset failed. Please check url or request password reset link again.
password_reset_success_instruction: Your password has been changed successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
user_with_this_email_not_found: User with this email not found
change_email_instruction: Enter your new email address. We will send you a confirmation email to provided email address. You need to confirm your new email address to update your account.
email_confirmation_sent_description: We have sent a confirmation email to the provided email address. Please check your inbox for further instructions to activate your new email address.
email_could_not_be_changed: Email could not be changed. You can request a new email change link.
